title: Design appointment booking UI
summary: As a patient, I can view available appointment slots and book an appointment through a user-friendly interface.
description:
Create an intuitive appointment booking interface that displays available time slots in a calendar view. The UI should show provider availability, allow selection of appointment type, and guide users through the booking process.

## Technical Details
- Calendar component with date/time selection
- Real-time availability checking
- Multi-step booking wizard
- Confirmation screen with appointment details

## UI Requirements
- Clean, modern calendar interface
- Clear indication of available vs. unavailable slots
- Appointment type selector
- Patient information form (if not logged in)
- Confirmation page with booking summary
acceptanceCriteria: User can view calendar with available time slots
User can select a date and time
Booking appears in patient's appointment history
